name: Casey
about: I want to join the water polo club so that I can practice my swimming. I have never been a strong swimmer, so I'd like to take this opportunity to practice and meet new people. I am a bioengineering major with a minor in CS. An interesting fact about myself is that I was adopted from South Korea when I was 4 months old. Pleasure to meet y'all!

name: Daniel
about: The water polo club sounds cool, and I would like to join a team.  I am bad at swimming, so I am taking a swimming lesson at Dixon.  I am a computer science major.

name: Brooke
about: I've been playing water polo for 8 years. I played in Beaverton, Oregon, for Sunset High School and Hills Club. I'm a sophomore in Computer Science.

name: Isabella
about: I have been playing water polo for about three years in California. I am currently a sophomore in Business Information Systems.
